note: Unique identifier for the vocabulary (e.g., '1275')
Title of the vocabulary (e.g., 'ISBDM Extent of Unitary Structure value vocabulary')
Namespace prefix for URIs, defaults to 'isbdm'
URI of the vocabulary (e.g., 'http://iflastandards.info/ns/isbdm/values/1275')
Type of the vocabulary, typically 'Vocabulary'
Description of the vocabulary's purpose
Additional notes about the vocabulary's scope and usage
Namespace URI that defines this vocabulary
Starting number for term IDs when using numeric URIs, defaults to 1000
Method for generating URIs: 'numeric' (default) or 'slug'
Case style for slug URIs: 'kebab-case' (default), 'snake_case', 'camelCase', or 'PascalCase'
Whether to display the title in the component, defaults to false
Whether to display the filter input, defaults to true
Placeholder text for the filter input, defaults to 'Filter vocabulary terms...'
Container for all RDF metadata
RDF type(s) of the vocabulary, typically includes 'skos:ConceptScheme'
Preferred label for the vocabulary with language tags - repeatable across languages but unique per language
Definition of the vocabulary with language tags
Scope note for the vocabulary with language tags
Note about modifications to the vocabulary
Note about past state or meaning of the vocabulary
Note for editors or maintainers of the vocabulary
Example of the use of the vocabulary
Array of terms in the vocabulary
Label of the term (e.g., 'activity card') - repeatable with language tags
Definition of the term - repeatable with language tags
Additional scope information for the term - repeatable with language tags
Notation or code for the term - repeatable with language tags
Example of the term's usage - repeatable with language tags
Note about modifications to the term - repeatable with language tags
Note about past state or meaning of the term - repeatable with language tags
Note for editors or maintainers about the term - repeatable with language tags
